article_title: Marco Rubio Has Supported Abortion Exceptions - The New York Times
article_text: Subscribe for updates on the 2016 presidential race, the White House and Congress, delivered to your inbox Monday - Friday.

article_metadata.author: Alan Rappeport

twitter.description: Senator Marco Rubio offered a forceful explanation for why he is pro-life and appeared offended at the notion that he had ever wavered on the issue. “I have never said that and I have never advocated that,” Mr. Rubio said when asked why he had supported exceptions that would allow for abortions in cases of […]
